title: Autism - Should We Avoid All Vaccines?
cleaned_text: Parents may to choose to seek out vaccines that they know are free of mercury and other toxic additives, but this is not as easy as one might think. The ones promoting vaccinations often themselves don't know what is in shots. If you ask "Is there mercury in that shot?" the default answer will be "no" regardless of the truth. For more information from Jack Miller CTN in Prescott
